RootLayout.title: Dissonic • For the love of live music
RootLayout.description: Keep track of concerts and bands you have experienced live. Made by fans for fans.

Error.headline: 500: Mistakes were made
Error.description: An application error has occurred. Please try again later or seek professional help.

NotFound.headline: 404: Page not found
NotFound.description: The requested resource could not be found. It may have been deleted or moved.

SignupPage.aDissonicAccountGivesYouTheFollowingFeat: A Dissonic account gives you the following features:
SignupPage.trackBandsAndConcertsYouHaveExperiencedL: Track bands and concerts you have experienced live
SignupPage.seeYourConcertHistoryAndStatistics: See your concert history and statistics
SignupPage.commentOnConcertsAndReactToComments: Comment on concerts and react to comments
SignupPage.contributeConcertsBandsAndLocations: Contribute to concerts, bands and locations
SignupPage.doYouHavAnAccountAlready: Do you have an account already?

SignupForm.usernameLengthError: The username must be between 4 and 16 characters long.
SignupForm.usernamePatternError: The username must only contain letters, numbers, underscores and periods.
SignupForm.usernameTakenError: This username is already taken. Try being creative.
SignupForm.passwordLengthError: The password must be at least 12 characters long.
SignupForm.emailAlreadyInUseError: This e-mail address is already linked to a user.
SignupForm.successMessage: Success! You will shortly receive an e-mail in which you can confirm your registration.
SignupForm.genericError: An error has occurred. Please try again.

LoginPage.emailPatternError: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
LoginPage.Invalid login credentials: The e-mail address or password is incorrect.
LoginPage.Email not confirmed: The e-mail address has not yet been confirmed.
LoginPage.youDontHaveAnAccountYet: You don’t have an account yet?

ResetPasswordPage.emailPatternError: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
ResetPasswordPage.resetPasswordSuccess: Success! You will shortly receive an e-mail in which you can reset your password.

UpdatePasswordPage.passwordLengthError: The password must be at least 12 characters long.
UpdatePasswordPage.updatePasswordSuccess: Success! You can now login with your new password.

Select.tryUsingASensibleSearchTerm: Try using a sensible search term.

ShareButton.urlCopiedToClipboard: The URL has been copied to the clipboard.

OAuthSettings.headline: OAuth settings
OAuthSettings.description: Link your account to third-party authentication providers. This allows you to log in with an existing account.
OAuthSettings.doYouReallyWantToUnlinkThisProvider: Do you really want to unlink <provider></provider>?

ContributionsPage.contributionsHint: Only contributions starting from September 2024 are counted.

ContributionItem.userContributedToConcert: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {created} UPDATE {updated} DELETE {deleted} ARCHIVE {archived} RESTORE {restored} other {unkown operation}} <concert></concert>
ContributionItem.userContributedToBand: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {created} UPDATE {updated} DELETE {deleted} ARCHIVE {archived} RESTORE {restored} other {unkown operation}} <band></band>
ContributionItem.userContributedToLocation: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {created} UPDATE {updated} DELETE {deleted} ARCHIVE {archived} RESTORE {restored} other {unkown operation}} <location></location>
ContributionItem.userContributedToFestivalRoot: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {created} UPDATE {updated} DELETE {deleted} ARCHIVE {archived} RESTORE {restored} other {unkown operation}} <festivalRoot></festivalRoot>
ContributionItem.userContributedToConcertBands: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {added <bands></bands> to <concert></concert>} DELETE {removed <bands></bands> from <concert></concert>} other {unkown operation}}
ContributionItem.userContributedToBandGenres: <user></user> {operation, select, INSERT {added <genres></genres> to <band></band>} DELETE {removed <genres></genres> from <band></band>} other {unkown operation}}
